sentences.en: A principle and method was proposed for process intensification by applying phase transition.
sentences.cn: 提出了将相变用于过程强化的原理和方法.

sentences.en: A sudden attack, recurrence , or intensification of a disease.
sentences.cn: 疾病的突然发作或复发.

sentences.en: Intensification of Livestock Production and Environmental Risks : Can We MakeSpatially Explicit Assessments?
sentences.cn: 如何评估集约式畜牧业生产的环境代价?

sentences.en: It can be asserted that the thought of Qin - Han Period is Yi - ology's intensification and extension.
sentences.cn: 可以说,一部秦汉思想史就是易学思想的衍扩和伸展,就是以易学思想为主潮、主旋律的思想发展史.

sentences.en: S . R . I is short for the system of rice intensification.
sentences.cn: 是水稻激化系统的缩写.

sentences.en: The basic principle of ultrasonic intensification and its application prospect in hydrometallurgical processes were concisely reviewed.
sentences.cn: 简要论述了湿法冶金过程中超声强化的基本原理及其应用前景.

sentences.en: The main ways of bubble prevention are material insurance, dry intensification, strict control of processing conditions.
sentences.cn: 其主要措施有:把好原料关 、 加强干燥 、 严格控制生产工艺条件.

sentences.en: The prevailing scenario will depend on the success of upland agricultural intensification.
sentences.cn: 这主要将取决于旱地农业集约化的成功.

sentences.en: Urbanization intensification of course plays an important role to urban population change of weight among them.
sentences.cn: 其中城市化过程的加深对城市人口重心的变化起了重要作用.
